artist: Artist: Jackson Pollock; Printer: Emiliano Sorini; Publisher: Museum of Modern Art, New York
creditline: The Christina N. and Swan J. Turnblad Memorial Fund
description: One of seven intaglio prints published posthumously by the Museum of Modern Art, New York, in 1967 under the authority of the Estate of Jackson Pollock. Plate was reworked in drypoint by Gabor Peterdi and steel-faced prior to printing.

markings:
Numbered in pencil, LR margin: 17/50
Blindstamp of the Estate of Jackson Pollock, LL margin: \"Estate of Jackson Pollock JP\" in a circle
Blindstamp of the printer Emiliano Sorini: \"ES\" in a square
medium: Engraving and drypoint with plate tone printed in brown-black
portfolio: From From a series of seven untitled intaglio prints
provenance: (Glen Hanson Gallery, Minneapolis); sold to MIA, 1978.
title: Untitled (6)
